import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { trackButtonClick } from '../utils/analytics'; import { portfolioData, createSlug } from '../data/portfolioData'; const PortfolioPage = () => { const [filter, setFilter] = useState('*'); const handleFilterChange = (newFilter) => { setFilter(newFilter); }; const navigate = useNavigate(); // Function to convert title to URL-friendly slug const createSlug = (title) => { return title .toLowerCase() .replace(/[^a-z0-9]+/g, '-') // Replace non-alphanumeric chars with hyphens .replace(/-+/g, '-') // Replace multiple hyphens with a single hyphen .replace(/^-|-$/g, ''); // Remove leading/trailing hyphens }; const handleProjectClick = (projectId) => { const project = portfolioData[projectId]; if (project) { const slug = createSlug(project.title); // Navigate within SPA to portfolio details section using slug navigate(`/portfolio/${slug}`); trackButtonClick(`Portfolio Details - ${project.title}`, 'Portfolio'); } }; return ( <> {/* Local styles for clickable portfolio entries */}

Portfolio

  1. Home
  2. Portfolio
{/* Section Title */} {/*

Portfolio

Check Our Portfolio
*/} {/* End Section Title */}
  • handleFilterChange('*')}> All Projects
  • handleFilterChange('.filter-ui')}> UI/UX
  • handleFilterChange('.filter-development')}> Development
  • handleFilterChange('.filter-photography')}> Photography
  • handleFilterChange('.filter-marketing')}> Marketing
handleProjectClick(1)}>

{/* End Portfolio Container */}
); }; export default PortfolioPage;
